author: Bill
content:
I really like the nice gentle S curves of the path. And the colours work so well together. That blue post amidst all that green should clash shouldn't it? Or is my limited understanding of colour theory even more limited than I thought? Anyway, it certainly works here. Nice capture.

I'll second all you said about Orphans... Andreas. It really is a testament to Tom Waits' versatility as an artist.
